title: How does a player cope with another player abandoning their lane?
body:
Like the title says. I played a game not long ago as Miss Fortune. My support: Leona. We were against a Caitlyn/Lulu botlane, and I thought we were doing fine but I noticed my Leona was recalling pretty often. So I asked her and I quote: "Please don't recall so often, Leona. You're going to miss out on all the exp." For some reason this led her to decide that I just sucked too badly for her and she chose to abandon the lane and move into midlane. Leaving me to the mercy of 3 people in the bot lane, with no help from anyone because Leona had convinced the team that I sucked too badly to help. Well, all but one other member of the team who was having connection issues. 

So how does a player deal and cope with the stress of this type of situation? My attempts to defend or push my lane during that game were rendered pointless without my support around, and 3 people always on botlane.

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

Edit: I was hoping for a serious conversation on the matter. It's something I really need help with right now. I'm still bamboozled over this one game and how I could have done better in this situation..

replies.body: I'd take Tiny Twitch's suggestion here. There's not a lot you can do to make people agree with you if they aren't willing to talk, but if they're being unsportsmanlike or harassing you then you can always report them in post-game.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=orI4oaNf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-07T01:13:57.833+0000)
>
> I'd take Tiny Twitch's suggestion here. There's not a lot you can do to make people agree with you if they aren't willing to talk, but if they're being unsportsmanlike or harassing you then you can always report them in post-game.

Thanks for the advice, it just sucks that it happens. I just wish I could have done more.

You cant do anything against 3 people, especially since they will just dive you and take tower anyway. The best thing you could do at that moment is go push out mid and try and take that tower as a 3 man group.

Other than that report the Leona at the end of the game for unsportsmanlike behaviour and go on with your life.
